documents.document: @MelenieNZ I must say that is a very well designed lost cat poster. Hope it works.
It borders on comical.

Reading 'the velveteen rabbit' gets me every time. Every time.
My girls look at me, confused, as I struggle to read the final pages. 😭
@Pundamentalism this, surely, must be your greatest work. 👏🏽
@storminwalker I know what you mean. I'm a more recent fan so also stunned by her talent.
@storminwalker def live. ridiculously talented. Her voice is amazing.
@Tubb1977 women's march + harmony = 😭❤
@ghettoanger yes. Maybe changed the font, but same message. I avert my eyes and scoff.
@ghettoanger that sign has been there FOREVER. At least 30 years. I am 40 and remember it as a kid.
Feeling quite chuffed as a scammer just hung up on me! And after only 1 minute. And I didn't even swear.... I may have fist pumped.
@garyturner they will think they are working at Seaworld. 🐳🎼
I thought I lost my kambrook crimper that I got in 1989. Spent several hours looking for it & just found the old gi… https://t.co/DL851RIhEw
@sambgrover @kirkj @danserif well we didn't have all the information did we. You should clip anything she wants.
@sambgrover @kirkj @danserif what a weird neighbour. He could clip them by the time he asks you.
@kirkj @sambgrover @danserif that's a bummer. You def felt the bomb
@hudsie42 @danielrbridges @sammeikle actually our bin fell over which was very traumatic.
@danserif @sambgrover our bin blew over. pretty rough on us as you can expect
@Tubb1977 @hudsie42 @greyshape but you're full of intrigue
@sambgrover thanks for your feedback. Always appreciated. 🙏🏽
@sambgrover poor old US with the enormous racial problems and couch potatoes.
@sambgrover ahem. Great Britain. It's called great for a reason. Less channels = less violence.
@sambgrover nope. That's not going to cut it. It needs to include the sense of it not lasting. Forced me time.
@sambgrover I agree. Did you read it? It pretty amazing. I killed the delivery. Killed it.
@danserif if I was a storm chaser, I'd rebrand myself as a weather bomb chaser.
It was very odd. The entrance was right beside us, but we went down alongside the length of the building. Then a hairpin and back again.
Nick Cave was magic. Special mention must go to the strange snake queue to get in...All around the TSB like we were following the Pied Piper
@danserif IT'S A WEATHER BOMB!!!!
Every time the trees move from the wind I find myself saying "WEATHER BOMB!" in a really alarming way. https://t.co/2IZgqHRLRe
@AndreAlessi @IvankaTrump @realDonaldTrump and is there no heating in the office?
@mkhll my mother swears by Moore Wilsons.
@hudsie42 @AJemaineClement yes happy birthday from us. I could have guessed you were a Capricorn too - steady goat.
This is so true. How do you parody that?! https://t.co/n58KAJ5DSi
@danielrbridges least the real feel is 39
@fraserStCbrown so sorry to hear this Fraser. Heart goes out to you. She sounded like such an amazing person.
@mattvarchar oh I thought those were band names. Yes I do know them.
@mattvarchar of course I have heard of none of those. None.
@wandaharland I can't look at Shetland ponies now without thinking of that amazing ad where one dances to Fleetwood Mac. They are a gift. 🐴
@wandaharland they have been there for years and years and make that part of the drive wonderful and worth being awake for.
.@nzherald we don't need to see photos of John Key in his togs on holiday in Hawaii, thank you.
@kiranmatthews the less channels, the less violence.
@kiranmatthews did you read it? So funny. USA is bad because lots of TV channels. Great Britain is great because not many channels. 😂
@Tubb1977 the diary is so dull, I probably cover details on Wednesday. You can borrow it to help get yourself to sleep.
And my diary entry when @TV3nz launched. No wonder we lost the debate. I was so excited I can barely string a sente… https://t.co/fsiXVVwlKN
My parents clearly had no oversight of my homework. I can see why I didn't become a lawyer. I got points for performance though.
Form 2 debate, 1989, We don't need a TV3. I was 3rd speaker. If you can be bother reading this very tenuous argumen… https://t.co/KtTH4jrbhu
In the boxes of stuff from my parents' house. I don't dare open it. Quite on trend with Moana. https://t.co/BR1YMrFE4L
Tribe Called Quest track drops N bomb. 5 year old turns around in hysterics saying "they just said knickers!!!". Phew. @nikaucafe @hudsie42
@garyturner @zubi89 yes. Similar to a coffee table book about coffee tables.
Someone dropped their shopping list in Karori today. https://t.co/M160NYBBGF
@zubi89 the book is apt though yes?
@RDiva I'm not going to lie, it felt amazing. Surge of happiness. The bubbles, a gift, but I got the greater gift really. Thanks P&K Marty!
@richardram thanks m8. I didn't have a filling until I was about 24. A point of pride for my mother, until I disappointed her.
@MsNeensMM nice! And to you too 😘
Went to MOANA with the girls and Grannie. Mum's movie review; "Maui was FAT! Not muscular". Of all the themes you could take away...😳

Ever supportive @hudsie42 said "YOU'RE KIDDING ME!"
This event has really made my day.
Just got IDed buying Moët! Like a baller. Pretty much giddy over this seeing I'm 40 in a week or so. https://t.co/RjMcECrhds
Being both cross & amused to find my brother recorded the word "crustation" over "Egyptian" on my tape copy of the… https://t.co/uS8s4HShcK
@AdrienneRewi ja. Good point. It would translate as "fast relaxation" or "condensed quiet time"
@Tubb1977 very smart. Make him work for it
@Tubb1977 so a craft activity one day perhaps. A collage made from teeth and tears.
@Tubb1977 it's like one of those giant clocks ticking in masterchef. QUARTER OF AN HOUR TO GO! RELAX!
@danielrbridges yes. But a frenzied, time-is-ticking serenity. Maybe ferenity. Or serenzied.
@roddrury they have one at Moore Wilsons now. Handy.
And I'm not thinking "me time". It's more frenzied than that. Precious and finite. Time goes fast. And wasted half of it looking at my phone
There should be a word for the feeling when you're kids are busy (e.g. Barbie movie) and you have half an hour to read your book.
@roddrury you could use it as dip for the scorched almonds.

"Stay still. Do not rock. Do not move. If you fall, you will hit concrete."
Just relaxing/living on the edge at th… https://t.co/rcLZXBeNJz
@nbrangenberg ugh. I am resolved to throw them out. It's the right thing to do.
@kirkj I think you're right. I'll wait till the results of the poll to come in and then throw them out.
@dritchie I can just imagine. What's this? ....a homemade rattle with human teeth
@sambgrover if anything. Or perhaps this IS the short version, and Eliza gets a handwritten novel or a film
@sambgrover more concerned about what to do with the teeth.
@sambgrover I agree! Made a rod for my own back
And what do you do with these baby teeth?! Seems callous to throw out, but creepy to keep.
Quite a bit of admin these days on behalf of the Tooth Fairy. https://t.co/7XjCZ2FCGT
The girls' teacher wanted the kids to know xmas was about giving (not just getting).So in the spirirt of xmas, they have given us colds. 😷
@tashmahal first time I read it was out loud to my girls & I found it very difficult to complete the story. they thought I was strange.
@jefweg well that is a plus
@mkhll don't cry for me 😭
@sambgrover which Christmas greeting is the most wonderful from the following?
@legenny oh I think it's that new algorithm that mines your subconscious and distant memories.
@garyturner @charliprangley 😂 you flatter me. I'd like to think I'm street hustle. But I think Christmas Apples is more Pollyanna.
I keep thinking about this video. Not just the content, but how she uses pauses. My speech & drama teacher would...… https://t.co/6Z4wWidXOc
@charliprangley that's flattering. I better tweet some more tips for you to bank. 😜
And, that night: "is there enough Christmas apple for me to have some tomorrow?" "yes, my dear child. you are in luck"
I know it's not becoming to toot your own horn, but that was GENIUS from me.
"Do you want some apple in your lunch?" "No thanks" "oh I'm surprised, because it's special Christmas apple" "can I please have some apple?"
It's not a nice feeling to falter in front of a crowd. Thank you Patti Smith for sharing your experience, and stren… https://t.co/3WlBSRXqrW
@sambgrover yes - strangely no stairs study as far as I can recall.
@Tubb1977 @sambgrover yeah- that's key. No respite
@sambgrover looking at https://t.co/CeQaXOW9Pf, it seems very typical for one actor to play several characters - evil twins and so on
@sambgrover i only saw it once or twice, and not with anyone major like Bo or Hope. @Tubb1977 may know more
@sambgrover presume they were filming & cutting pretty intensely with no breaks (like they have on SS). If someone is sick, show must go on
@sambgrover i know. as my friend said both vicious and perceptive. She is her mother's daughter.
@powderkeig unsure. It almost resembles crystal. Hopefully not for cheese and crackers....will investigate and report back.
@nbrangenberg that's good! Recycling! But not to put cheese and crackers on right?
My friend's mother reuses plastic meat trays, "Oh that's quite useful. I'll keep that". https://t.co/VaS1dl4OkI
@Tubb1977 that would be handy too. Good idea.
This is great, but couldn't they leap for the camera? https://t.co/4rpELl3IQD
Last scene of mid-season final of #TheWalkingDead was a masterclass in non verbal communication. I have never seen so many knowing looks.
